game.name: Barbies Valentines Disaster
game.description:
All the love birds are celebrating the Valentines Day today. The beautiful Olivia also receives the message from her handsome love Ken asking on a romantic date. The cool hunk is very happy and the gorgeous girl does not want to miss any opportunity to impress him. But, it seems that an accident has spoiled her outfit. So, the girl has decided to go back her home and get her ready before Ken arrives. Join Barbies Valentines Disaster and be prepared to help the cute doll get an attractive look!

Your objective in this brand new dressing game for girls is to help Olivia to remove her clothes first and then guide her pick up the perfect dress. You will see a basket on the screen. Place all the dirty clothes in it and then look at the closet where a fine collection of trendy outfits and accessories is stored! Select an outfit and combine it with a matching hairstyle and some sparkling and glitzy accessories in this one of the best girls games!

I would suggest you to choose the red color dress with ruffles and match it with a sweetheart neckline. Use your fashion abilities to get her dressed up with a cool outfit and make their tonight dinner very romantic! Now it is in your hands how you would save the princess from this worst situation by helping her select another stunning dress. Hurry up, friends! Her boyfriend is just about to reach at the restaurant. Dress her up fast to make her available at the restaurant on time in this Barbie doll games for kids!
